description: good game, actually is funny look when something you "program" don't result like the game specs you do for advance in the own game so, good art, and interesting mechanic.
Fun and you learn to code along the way

I really enjoyed this game and was absolutely astonished by the quality of it! It is entirely playable and looks like something you'd pay $5-10 for on Steam. There are a few minor graphical glitches here and there that become more aparent as you gain the dash ability later in the game. Still overall a very polished game by freebie standards. However, I cannot defeat the boss on the final level. After hacking it's security system, the boss loses about 30% health and just freezes there. I assume it is supposed to become animated again and regain shields and then the process is done three times in order to open the final door, but that never happens.
summary: Great puzzle-platformer! Boss on level 10 is broken

description: The entire concept seems appealing and I think I could have lots of fun with it. However, something seems to be wrong with the rendering, most of the screen flimmers to black several times per second, which causes quite the strain to the eyes. I also haven't figured out how to progress past the second part of level 1 yet, but that might also be because I can't focus with the flimmering.
Intéressant et belle réalisation. Anglais seulement.
summary: Jeu de plateformes mélant initiation au code Javascript
